roleset.name: providing/getting money for

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Johnny - I understand where you 're coming from on public campaign financing , but I tend to resist such a program / policy on principle .

example.name: args 3, 1
example.text: It said it will also offer buyers the option of financing as low as 6.9 % on 24 - month loans .

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, finance-n.01. No VNcls.
